I love this game and keep playing it since 2018 (that's not my main acc). I see a lot of very cool updates in the future and also see that devs are really trying to make the game better
But sadly, this game has a very toxic community.
   If you have self-esteem, I wouldn't recommend you to play this game, cause most of players will expect you to play like they want and won't find anything wrong in sending you messages like "kys retarded pos" 

   (seriously, people, get a real life, how can u get mad cause of the game)

I hope this game burns in hell with it's creator...

Игра хорошая, залипательная. С друзьями можно поиграть вечерок другой. Но есть пара минусов. 1-Лаги(хотя поиграя большое кол-во времени на них уже как то пофигу). 2-Маньяки кемперы конченные п*****сы, которые портят игру. 3-Играть с рандомами сложно, так как сурвов посстоянно фиксят, а манов апают, из-за чего без голосового играть тяжело, но можно. В остальном игра хороша и интересна. Советую

I really tried to love this game (as you can see by the amount of hours I've put in). My wife and some of our friends played this for hours on in. However this game continues to be one sided for the killers. Communication in this game is key but there is no party chat within game. There seems to be extremely scarce ways to trick the killer and the killers move at a unremarkable speed. Also chances to escape off the hooks are so slim that when you play with random people, it's basically game over. Yeah it's marketed as 4v1 but the 4 are at a disadvantage when you cannot communicate with your team. I've seen scary movies. Groups of people communicate to try and figure things out. They also find ways to fight off and/or kill the killer. I'm not saying that it needs to be easy but damn it, give the survivors a chance by increase speed for them or reduce the killers hit radius! It's like once the killer spots them and starts chasing, you are almost guaranteed to get hit and/or captured. It's ridiculous. There should be more ways to incapacitate the killer than just some measly flashlight that barely hold battery juice even with upgrades. I get that this game is going for the "fear effect" but human instinct has fight or flight when in this type of condition. This game is only allows flight! No fight!

Sadly, I'll probably play the game every so often still because the only time my wife, our friends and myself seem to have fun is when we play one of us as the killer. There needs to be some sort of change within this game. Thankfully we are finding other games to play lately and slowly but 100% surely phasing this game out!

One of my favorite games so far. I've had this game since early October 2016. In my opinion the best asymmetric survival horror game (I've played so far). There are some issues at times, but the devs always come up with a solution in no-time.
clunky and rough around the edges, but a very  enjoyable horror multiplayer game.

Asymetric survival game. You can pay for cosmetics and movie characters. Other than that everything is buy-able with points you earn buy doing actions. By repairing a generator, healing a teammate, running away from killer etc. you earn Blood Points. These points are used for buying equipment. If you succesfully escape, you can "save" on equipment.

Players cannot interact with each other in-game. Still there is some toxicity. Example; a survivor can light his flashlight on you so you can be seen.
